subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish, a 22-year-old domestic sensation, will join his compatriot Daisuke Matsuzaka in a formidable starting rotation at the World Baseball Classic.
snippet: Yu Darvish, a 22-year-old domestic sensation, will join his compatriot Daisuke Matsuzaka in a formidable starting rotation at the World Baseball Classic.
